title: Jeopardy! Bot
description:
Provided with Wikipedia articles, the bot can produce an answer to a given Jeopardy! question.
 
We used FAISS to retrieve the 5 most relevant Wikipedia articles to the question, T5 to transform the Jeopardy! question into proper question form, and RoBERTa to answer the question given the relevant articles.
 
My personal contribution was deploying FAISS and RoBERTa as well as assiting debugging question reformation with T5.
